content: and charities have very specific requirements for donations e g yarn type colours etc make sure you check with the recipient to ensure your donations will be accepted a little bit about us fox creations is a family-run crafty business based in adelaide south australia we love crochet and just about anything to do with yarn our mission is to help as many people as possible to access and enjoy the world of crochet that s why we re committed to creating beginner-friendly patterns which have been developed in conjunction with neurodiverse crafters disclaimer this fox creations pattern text images charts etc is copyrighted and cannot be resold you can sell small batches of finished products made from this pattern with credit to fox creations e g label or online listing please don t share the digital pattern or screenshots - encourage others to download their own copy from our ravelry store or website we strive for accuracy but cannot be held liable for errors or variations in your finished product happy crocheting please email us if you have any questions hello@foxcreations com au preemie baby beanies© www foxcreations com au 3 pattern 1 double_crochet round # instructions stitch count round 1 2 step 1 make a crochet circle to match the width needed in the 24 2 rds second column of the chart above follow the standard crochet circle pattern until the circle is the right size - chain 2 at the beginning of each round does not count as a stitch - place the first double_crochet of the round in the same stitch as the slip_stitch - slip stich to the first double_crochet at the end of each round - do not turn - repeat instructions between the * * - sew in the tail from the magic_ring after a couple rounds standard crochet circle you will always work the increase into the 2nd stitch of the increase in the previous round round 1 double_crochet 12 times in a magic_ring 12 round 2 increase in each stitch 24 round 3 *double_crochet increase* repeat 12 times 36 round 4 *2 double_crochet increase* repeat 12 times 48 if you need a bigger circle keep adding 1 double_crochet before the increase in each round the stitch count for each additional round will increase by 12 for the example we have crochet 2 rounds of a double_crochet circle and is size 20 24 weeks step 2 stop increasing for the height of the hat preemie baby beanies© www foxcreations com au 4 follow the hat height measurements in the chart above taking into account that you will work 1 more round for the ribbed brim our example is worked in joined rounds of double_crochet do not turn at the end of each round round 3 - 7 chain 2 double_crochet in each stitch around slip_stitch to the 1st st 24 5 rds chain 2 double_crochet in each stitch around slip_stitch to the first stitch of the round round 8 ribbed brim 24
